lead_paragraph: Witnesses have come forward to clear 17-year-old Butch of an assault charge and with 2 weeks of good behavior, he could be released. But he finds he has to become vicious to survive in jail.
snippet: Witnesses have come forward to clear 17-year-old Butch of an assault charge and with 2 weeks of good behavior, he could be released. But he finds he has to become vicious to survive in jail.
